name: SPIRIT:
text: Hmm?

name: SPIRIT:
text: You seem lost.

name: SPIRIT:
text: You know, it's rare to see someone around this place.

name: SPIRIT:
text: What is this place?

name: SPIRIT:
text: Hmmm I think I remember a thing or two.

name: SPIRIT:
text: But wait. Who are you anyways?

name: SPIRIT:
text: Oh.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Well, such a coincidence. I dont remember who I am either.

name: SPIRIT:
text: All I know is that I want to leave this place. I'd love to see the blue sky again.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Oh, you'd like to leave too?

name: SPIRIT:
text: I think we could get along quite well.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Listen, i've got a deal for you.

name: SPIRIT:
text: You know, being sitting here for a while, I'm not as tough as I used to be.

name: SPIRIT:
text: And you seem that you could handle stuff on your own.

name: SPIRIT:
text: But you know ... humans only die once.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I could help with that.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I was gifted with the power of Chronoshifting.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I could bring you back in time in case of trouble.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Still, you shant be careless. As I said, I lack the full strength that I once had.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Abuse of this power and I will cease to exist.

name: SPIRIT:
text: And thats not fun, you know.

name: SPIRIT:
text: So, this is the deal.

name: SPIRIT:
text: You help me get out here, and I'll make sure you don't get lost in the dark.

name: SPIRIT:
text: It's settled then.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Well, we could say that you saved me from being stuck here.

name: SPIRIT:
text: So how about I call you HERO?

name: SPIRIT:
text: Thats the spirit.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Ok, enough talk. Shall we go now?
